claimReturn(address).details: Claim the return amount of the specified address.

params._user: The address to query the claim return amount of.

claimReturn(address).return: Flag, if 0:cannot claim, 1: Already Claimed, 2: Claimed

estimatePredictionValue(uint256,uint256,.details: Get estimated amount of prediction points for given inputs.

params._leverage: The leverage opted by user at the time of prediction.
params._prediction: The option on which user place prediction.

params.functionSignature: Signature of the actual function to be called via meta transaction
params.userAddress: Address of user trying to do meta transaction

getData().return: _marketCurrency bytes32 representing the currency or stock name of the market.minvalue uint[] memory representing the minimum range of all the options of the market.maxvalue uint[] memory representing the maximum range of all the options of the market._optionPrice uint[] memory representing the option price of each option ranges of the market._ethStaked uint[] memory representing the ether staked on each option ranges of the market._plotStaked uint[] memory representing the plot staked on each option ranges of the market._predictionTime uint representing the type of market._expireTime uint representing the time at which market closes for prediction_predictionStatus uint representing the status of the market.

getMarketFeedData().return: market currency namemarket currency feed address

getMarketResults().details: Gets the result of the market.
getMarketResults().return: uint256 representing the winning option of the market.uint256 Value of market currently at the time closing market.uint256 representing the positions of the winning option.uint[] memory representing the reward to be distributed.uint256 representing the Eth staked on winning option.uint256 representing the PLOT staked on winning option.

getOptionPrice(uint256).details: Gets the price of specific option.

params._prediction: The option number to query the balance of.

getReturn(address).details: Gets the return amount of the specified address.

params._user: The address to specify the return of

getReturn(address).return: returnAmount uint[] memory representing the return amount.incentive uint[] memory representing the amount incentive._incentiveTokens address[] memory representing the incentive tokens.

getUserFlags(address).return: Flag defining if user had availed multiplierFlag defining if user had predicted with bPLOT

getUserPredictionPoints(address,uint256).details: Gets number of positions user got in prediction

params._maxValue: The maximum value of neutral option range.
params._minValue: The minimum value of neutral option range.
params._startTime: The time at which market will create.

marketCoolDownTime().return: the time upto which user can raise the dispute after the market is settled

marketSettleTime().return: the time at which the market result will be declared

placePrediction(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Place prediction on the available options of the market.

params._asset: The asset used by user during prediction whether it is plotToken address or in ether.
params._leverage: The leverage opted by user at the time of prediction.
params._prediction: The option on which user placed prediction.
params._predictionStake: The amount staked by user at the time of prediction.

raiseDispute(uint256,string,string,strin.details: Raise the dispute if wrong value passed at the time of market result declaration.

params.proposalTitle: The title of proposal created by user.
params.proposedValue: The proposed value of market currency.

params.accepted: Flag mentioning if dispute is accepted or not
params.finalResult: The final correct value of market currency.

settleMarket().details: Settle the market, setting the winning option

executeMetaTransaction(address,bytes,byt.notice: Main function to be called when user wants to execute meta transaction. The actual function to be called should be passed as param with name functionSignature Here the basic signature recovery is being used. Signature is expected to be generated using personal_sign method.
